AD_ALERTRULE.NAME: Space Info
AD_ALERTRULE.SELECTCLAUSE: Tablespace_Name, COUNT (*) AS Pieces, SUM (bytes)/1024/1024 Free_MB, MAX (bytes)/1024 Largest_kB, ROUND(MAX (bytes) / SUM (bytes),2) * 100 Ratio, SUM (blocks) Free_Blocks, MAX (blocks) Largest_Blocks, ROUND(SQRT (MAX (blocks) / SUM (blocks)) * (100 / SQRT (SQRT (COUNT (blocks)))),2) Fragmentation_Index
